The if statement
```{r}

medium <- "Facebook"
num_views <- 14

if(medium == "Linkedin"){
  print("Showing Linkedin Information")
} else {
  print("Unknowing medium")
}

  

if(num_views >15){
  print("You're popular!")
} else {
  print ("Try to be more visible!")
}
  
```
Customize further: else if
```{r}
if(medium == "Linkedin"){
  print("Showing Linkedin Information")
} else if(medium == "Facebook") {
  print("Show facebook information")
} else {
  print("Unknowing medium")
}

```

Else if 2.0
```{r}
number <- 75
if(number<10){
  if(number < 5){
    result <-"extra small"
  } else {
    result <- "small"
  }
} else if (number <100){
  result <- "medium"
}else {
  result <-"large"
}
print(result)
```
